org.hkijena.acaq5.api.parameters

Class ACAQParameterTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.acaq5.api.parameters.ACAQParameterTree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ACAQCustomParameterCollection, ACAQParameterCollection

    public class ACAQParameterTree
extends Object
implements ACAQParameterCollection, ACAQCustomParameterCollection
    An ACAQParameterCollection that contains all the parameters of one or multiple ACAQParameterCollection instances in a traversed form.

                                  String key,
                                  ACAQParameterTree.Node parent)
        Adds a new ACAQParameterCollection into this collection. Ignores sources that have already been added
        Parameters:
        child - the added collection
        key - the unique key within the parent node
        parent - the parent node. Can be null (then defaults to root)

      • getParameters

        public Map<String,ACAQParameterAccess> getParameters()
        Description copied from interface: ACAQCustomParameterCollection
        Returns all parameters Please note that those parameters must be sourced in this collection. Use getChildParameterCollections() to add those
        Specified by:
        getParameters in interface ACAQCustomParameterCollection
        Returns:
        Modifiable map of parameters

      • getAllChildParameters

        public List<ACAQParameterAccess> getAllChildParameters(Object entry)
        Returns all child parameters of the entry If the entry is an ACAQParameterAccess, it is returned. Otherwise all children of the ACAQParameterCollection are returned.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry.
        Returns:
        all parameters that are children of the entry or the entry itself
